About Me

Let me tell you about myself....

BIO

My name is Daniel Lee, and I am a full stack developer currently looking for new opportunities. I graduated from the University of Washington with a Bachelors of Science in Biology. A couple years after graduating I decided to pursue a career in the tech industry and joined the Coding Dojo to learn programming. I graduated with a triple blackbelt, which is the highest achievement you can earn at the school. I love solving complicated problems, which is why I think I fell in love with coding. The process of finding the best way to write a certain line of code and discovering different solutions makes coding so exciting. And to top it all off the satisfaction of figuring out the problem and watching your creation come to life is incomparable to anything else.
